mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO as noticeNo, NOTICE_SUBJECT as noticeSubject, NOTICE_CONTENT as noticeContent, NOTICE_WRITER as noticeWriter, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as writeDate, VIEW_COUNT as viewCount, CATEGORY as category, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as createdAt, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as updatedAt FROM NOTICE ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(NOTICE_NO), 0) + 1 FROM NOTICE
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER, WRITE_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, CATEGORY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{noticeNo}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeWriter}, SYSDATE, 0, #{category}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_SUBJECT = #{noticeSubject}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent}, CATEGORY = #{category}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
